metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9246 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The PGObject::Util::DBAdmin module before 0.120.0 for Perl, as used inLedgerSMB through 1.5.x, insufficiently sanitizes or escapes variablevalues used as part of shell command execution, resulting in shell codeinjection via the create(), run_file(), backup(), or restore() function.The vulnerability allows unauthorized users to execute code with the sameprivileges as the running application.

criterions.comment: libpgobject-util-dbadmin-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
